locales.description: Unwanted, repeated, or unrelated actions that bother users.
locales.name: Spam

locales.description: Pretending to be someone else without permission.
locales.name: Impersonation

locales.description: Promotes self-harm, including graphic images, glorifying discussions, or triggering stories.
locales.name: Self-Harm

locales.description: May be unsafe and could harm your device, steal your info, or get your account hacked.
locales.name: Security Concerns

locales.description: Altered images/videos, deceptive links, or false statements.
locales.name: Misleading

locales.description: Promotes violence or harm towards others, including threats, incitement, or advocacy of harm.
locales.name: Threats

locales.description: Links to harmful sites with malware, phishing, or violating content that risk security and privacy.
locales.name: Unsafe link

locales.description: Promoting or selling potentially illicit goods, services, or activities.
locales.name: Illicit

locales.description: Spreading false or misleading info, including unverified claims and harmful conspiracy theories.
locales.name: Misinformation

locales.description: This claim has not been confirmed by a credible source yet.
locales.name: Unconfirmed

locales.description: Rude or impolite, including crude language and disrespectful comments, without constructive purpose.
locales.name: Rude

locales.description: Radical views advocating violence, hate, or discrimination against individuals or groups.
locales.name: Extremist

locales.description: May be upsetting, covering topics like substance abuse or mental health issues, cautioning sensitive viewers.
locales.name: Sensitive

locales.description: Insincere content or bulk actions aimed at gaining followers, including frequent follows, posts, and likes.
locales.name: Engagement Farming

locales.description: Bot or a person pretending to be someone else.
locales.name: Inauthentic Account

locales.description: Art with explicit or suggestive sexual themes, including provocative imagery or partial nudity.
locales.name: Sexually Suggestive (Cartoon)

creator.description:
Labels accounts based on facts about profile records, post history, etc. Automatic.
Support @bossett.social / Code https://github.com/Bossett/bsky-profile-labeller / Help out https://ko-fi.com/bossett

locales.description: This user began using this handle on this account less than 14 days ago.
locales.name: Changed Handle

locales.description: This user is missing a profile picture or display name.
locales.name: Incomplete Profile

locales.description: This user has not made a non-reply post.
locales.name: Only Replies

locales.description: This account has been posting at closely timed intervals without a break the last 30 posts.
locales.name: Periodic

locales.description: This user has a did from a namespace other than did:plc: (and therefore handle history not available).
locales.name: Non-PLC DID

locales.description: This user is on a non-ATProto network, bridged in from Bridgy (https://fed.brid.gy/docs).
locales.name: Bridgy User

locales.description: This user originates from Nostr and has been bridged in via other networks by Bridgy. Does NOT include users who have just validated a handle with an npub signature.
locales.name: Nostr User

locales.description: This user originates from Threads and has been bridged in by Bridgy.
locales.name: Threads User

locales.description: noun. Slang. a situation, task, etc., that seems difficult or frustrating: With no sleep last night, I'll be on the struggle bus today.
locales.name: Strugglebus

locales.description: This user is known to be extremely dangerous and problematic. DO NOT INTERACT.
locales.name: DANGEROUS USER

locales.description: This user is the bug queen of Bluesky.
locales.name: Bug Queen

locales.description: This account is verified to belong to a governmental entity.
locales.name: Official Government Account

locales.description: This user is the official Jester of the AT Protocol.
locales.name: ATProto Jester

locales.description: User does not quite say what they mean.
locales.name: Sarcastic

locales.description: User reposts their own posts before an hour has even passed
locales.name: Jerry

creator.description:
Are you kiki or bouba? Like this labeller to find out

Remove label: https://bsky.app/profile/kiki-bouba.mozzius.dev/post/3l4obq2dxhs2p

Note: your avatar will be sent to GPT-4o for evaluation

locales.description: User has been judged and deemed kiki

locales.description: User has been judged and deemed bouba

creator.description:
Like & Subscribe to find out your class
If you want to find out what commands are available
@bskyttrpg.bsky.social listcommands

Any issues, reach out to @ripperoni.com

locales.description: There‚Äôs no sight more beautiful to you than a strange brew bubbling in a beaker, and you consume your ingenious elixirs with abandon. You‚Äôre fascinated by uncovering the secrets of science and the natural world, and you‚Äôre constantly experimenting in your lab or on the go with inventive concoctions for every eventuality. You are fearless in the face of risk, hurling explosive or toxic creations at your foes. Your unique path toward greatness is lined with alchemical brews that push your mind and body to their limits.

locales.description: Rage consumes you in battle. Your rages draw upon a vicious instinct, which you might associate with an animal, a spirit, or some part of yourself. You have powerful defenses that you share freely with your allies and innocent bystanders, as well as holy power you use to end the threat of evil. locales.description: Deities work their will upon the world in infinite ways, and you serve as one of their most stalwart mortal servants. Blessed with divine magic, you live the ideals of your faith, adorn yourself with the symbols of your church, and train diligently to wield your deity‚Äôs favored weapon. Your spells might protect and heal your allies, or they might punish foes and enemies of your faith, as your deity wills. locales.description: The power of nature is impossible to resist. It can bring ruin to the stoutest fortress in minutes, reducing even the mightiest works to rubble, burning them to ash, burying them beneath an avalanche of snow, or drowning them beneath the waves. It can provide endless bounty and breathtaking splendor to those who respect it‚Äî and an agonizing death to those who take it too lightly. You are one of those who hear nature‚Äôs call. You stand in awe of the majesty of its power and give yourself over to its service.

Ela pode arruinar a mais resistente das fortalezas em minutos, reduzir at√© mesmo as obras mais bem feitas a detritos, queim√°-las em cinzas, enterr√°-las sob uma avalanche de neve ou submergi-las sob as ondas. Ela pode fornecer magnanimidade e esplendor de tirar o f√¥lego √†queles que a respeitam ‚Äî e uma morte agonizante √†queles que a tratam levianamente. Voc√™ √© um dos que ouvem o chamado da natureza. Voc√™ reverencia a majestade de seu poder e se entrega a seu servi√ßo.

locales.description: Fighting for honor, greed, loyalty, or simply the thrill of battle, you are an undisputed master of weaponry and combat techniques. You combine your actions through clever combinations of opening moves, finishing strikes, and counterattacks whenever your foes are unwise enough to drop their guard. Whether you are a knight, mercenary, sharpshooter, or blade master, you have honed your martial skills into an art form and perform devastating critical attacks on your enemies.

locales.name: Guerreiro

locales.description: The strength of your fist flows from your mind and spirit. You seek perfection‚Äîhoning your body into a flawless instrument and your mind into an orderly bastion of wisdom. You‚Äôre a fierce combatant renowned for martial arts skills and combat stances that grant you unique fighting moves. While the challenge of mastering many fighting styles drives you to great heights, you also enjoy meditating on philosophical questions and discovering new ways to obtain peace and enlightenment.

locales.description: A for√ßa de seu punho flui de sua mente e esp√≠rito. Embora o desafio de dominar v√°rios estilos de luta o leve a grandes alturas, voc√™ tamb√©m gosta de meditar sobre quest√µes filos√≥ficas e descobrir novas maneiras de obter paz e ilumina√ß√£o.
locales.name: Monge

locales.description: You command powerful magic, not through study or devotion to any ideal, but as a vessel or agent for a mysterious, otherworldly patron that even you don't entirely understand. This entity might be a covert divinity, a powerful fey, a manifestation of natural energies, an ancient spirit, or any other mighty supernatural being‚Äîbut its nature is likely as much a mystery to you as it is to anyone else. Through a special familiar, your patron grants you versatile spells and powerful hexes to use as you see fit, though you're never certain if these gifts will end up serving your patron's larger plan.

Por meio de um familiar especial, seu patrono lhe concede magias vers√°teis e feiti√ßos poderosos para usar como quiser, embora voc√™ nunca tenha certeza se esses dons acabar√£o servindo ao plano maior de seu patrono.

locales.description: You are an eternal student of the arcane secrets of the universe, using your mastery of magic to cast powerful and devastating spells. You treat magic like a science, cross-referencing the latest texts on practical spellcraft with ancient esoteric tomes to discover and understand how magic works. Yet magical theory is vast, and there‚Äôs no way you can study it all. You either specialize in one of the eight schools of magic, gaining deeper understanding of the nuances of those spells above all others, or favor a broader approach that emphasizes the way all magic comes together at the expense of depth.

locales.description: Voc√™ √© um eterno estudante dos segredos arcanos do universo, utilizando sua maestria m√≠stica para conjurar magias poderosas e devastadoras. Voc√™ trata a magia como uma ci√™ncia, cruzando refer√™ncias de textos mais recentes da pr√°tica m√°gica moderna com tomos esot√©ricos antigos para descobrir e compreender o funcionamento interno da magia. Por√©m, o campo da teoria m√°gica √© vasto, e n√£o h√° como voc√™ estud√°-lo por completo. Voc√™ se especializa em uma das oito escolas de magia, aprofundando-se nas nuances desse tipo espec√≠fico de magia ou assume uma abordagem mais ampla enfatizando os la√ßos em comum que unem todas as magias.

You play a dangerous game, seeking thrills and testing your skills, and likely don‚Äôt care much for any laws that happen to get in your way. While the path of every rogue is unique and riddled with danger, the one thing you all share in common is the breadth and depth of your skills.

locales.description: Voc√™ √© competente e oportunista. Usando sua perspic√°cia sagaz e rea√ß√µes r√°pidas, voc√™ tira vantagem dos erros de seus oponentes e ataca onde mais d√≥i. Voc√™ faz apostas perigosas, ca√ßando emo√ß√µes e testando os limites de suas habilidades, e provavelmente n√£o se importa muito com quaisquer leis que possam atrapalhar sua empreitada. Embora o caminho de todo ladino seja √∫nico e cheio de perigos, a √∫nica coisa que todos t√™m em comum √© a variedade e profundidade de suas per√≠cias.

locales.description: Some rangers believe civilization wears down the soul, but still needs to be protected from wild creatures. Others say nature needs to be protected from the greedy, who wish to tame its beauty and plunder its treasures. You could champion either goal, or both. You might be a scout, tracker, or hunter of fugitives or beasts, haunting the edge of civilization or exploring the wilds. You know how to live off the land and are skilled at spotting and taking down both opportune prey and hated enemies.

locales.description: Alguns patrulheiros acreditam que a civiliza√ß√£o desgasta a alma, mas ainda precisa ser protegida de criaturas selvagens. Outros dizem que a natureza precisa ser protegida dos gananciosos, que desejam domar sua beleza e saquear seus tesouros. Voc√™ pode defender um desses objetivos ou mesmo ambos. Voc√™ pode ser um batedor, rastreador ou ca√ßador de bestas ou de fugitivos, vivendo √†s margens da civiliza√ß√£o ou explorando os ermos. Voc√™ sabe viver da terra e √© competente em abater presas oportunas e inimigos odiados
locales.name: Patrulheiro

locales.description: You didn‚Äôt choose to become a spellcaster‚Äîyou were born one. There‚Äôs magic in your blood, whether a divinity touched one of your ancestors, a forebear communed with a primal creature, or a powerful occult ritual influenced your line. Self-reflection and study allow you to refine your inherent magical skills and unlock new, more powerful abilities. The power in your blood carries a risk, however, and you constantly face the choice of whether you‚Äôll rise to become a master spellcaster or fall into destruction.

locales.description: Voc√™ n√£o escolheu se tornar um conjurador ‚Äî voc√™ nasceu assim. A magia corre em seu sangue, seja porque uma divindade marcou um de seus ancestrais, porque um antepassado comungou com uma criatura primal ou porque um poderoso ritual ocultista influenciou sua linhagem. Autorreflex√£o e estudo lhe permitem refinar suas habilidades m√°gicas inerentes e acessar novas habilidades mais poderosas. Entretanto, o poder em seu sangue carrega um risco e voc√™ constantemente enfrenta a escolha de se erguer como um mestre conjurador ou sucumbir √† destrui√ß√£o.
locales.name: Feiticeiro

locales.description: The mind can perceive truths hidden to fine-tuned instruments, house more secrets than any tome, and move objects and hearts more deftly than any lever. By delving into both the conscious and subconscious aspects of your inner self, you have awoken to the might of psychic magic, allowing you to cast spells not through incantations or gestures but by the power of your will alone. While the thin line between your mind and reality means that a single errant thought could have unintended consequences for yourself and your companions, you know that anything is possible, if you can imagine it.
locales.name: Psychic

locales.description: A mente √© capaz de perceber verdades ocultas at√© mesmo em instrumentos afinados, de guardar mais segredos do que qualquer livro e de mover objetos e cora√ß√µes com mais destreza do que qualquer alavanca. Ao mergulhar nos aspectos conscientes e subconscientes do seu eu interior, voc√™ despertou para o poder da magia ps√≠quica, o que lhe permite lan√ßar feiti√ßos n√£o por meio de encantamentos ou gestos, mas apenas pelo poder da sua vontade. Embora a linha t√™nue entre sua mente e a realidade signifique que um √∫nico pensamento err√¥neo pode ter consequ√™ncias indesejadas para voc√™ e seus companheiros, voc√™ sabe que tudo √© poss√≠vel, se voc√™ puder imaginar.
locales.name: Ps√≠quico

locales.description: The power of the elements flows from within you. Roaring fire, pure water, fleeting air, steadfast earth, twisting wood, slicing metal. A kinetic gate inextricably tied to your body channels power directly from the elemental planes, causing elements to leap to your hand, whirl around your body, and blast foes at your whim. As your connection to the planes grows, you attain true mastery over your chosen elements.
locales.name: Kineticist

locales.description: O poder dos elementos flui de dentro de voc√™. Fogo crepitante, √°gua pura, ar fugaz, terra firme, madeira retorcida, metal cortante. Um portal cin√©tico inextricavelmente ligado ao seu corpo canaliza o poder diretamente dos planos elementais, fazendo com que os elementos saltem para a sua m√£o, girem em torno do seu corpo e explodam os inimigos a seu bel-prazer. √Ä medida que sua conex√£o com os planos aumenta, voc√™ atinge o verdadeiro dom√≠nio sobre os elementos escolhidos.
locales.name: Cineticista

locales.description: You can magically beckon a powerful being called an eidolon to your side, serving as the mortal conduit that anchors it to the world. Whether your eidolon is a friend, a servant, or even a personal god, your connection to it marks you as extraordinary, shaping the course of your life dramatically
locales.name: Summoner

locales.description: Voc√™ pode chamar magicamente um ser poderoso chamado eidolon para ficar ao seu lado, servindo como um canal mortal que o ancora ao mundo. Quer o seu eidolon seja um amigo, um servo ou at√© mesmo um deus pessoal, sua conex√£o com ele o marca como extraordin√°rio, moldando dramaticamente o curso de sua vida
locales.name: Invocador

locales.description: Your conduit to divine power eschews the traditional channels of prayer and servitude‚Äîyou instead glean divine truths that extend beyond any single deity. You understand the great mysteries of the universe embodied in overarching concepts that transcend good and evil or chaos and law, whether because you perceive the common ground across multiple deities or circumvent their power entirely. You explore one of these mysteries and draw upon its power to cast miraculous spells, but that power comes with a terrible price: a curse that grows stronger the more you draw upon it. Your abilities are a double-edged sword, which you might uphold as an instrument of the divine or view as a curse from the gods.
locales.name: Oracle

locales.description: Seu canal para o poder divino evita os canais tradicionais de ora√ß√£o e servid√£o - em vez disso, voc√™ colhe verdades divinas que v√£o al√©m de qualquer divindade. Voc√™ entende os grandes mist√©rios do universo incorporados em conceitos abrangentes que transcendem o bem e o mal ou o caos e a lei, seja porque voc√™ percebe a base comum entre v√°rias divindades ou porque contorna totalmente o poder delas. Voc√™ explora um desses mist√©rios e utiliza seu poder para lan√ßar feiti√ßos milagrosos, mas esse poder tem um pre√ßo terr√≠vel: uma maldi√ß√£o que se torna mais forte quanto mais voc√™ a utiliza. Suas habilidades s√£o uma faca de dois gumes, que voc√™ pode defender como um instrumento do divino ou ver como uma maldi√ß√£o dos deuses.

locales.description: You seek to uncover the truth, doggedly pursuing leads to reveal the plots of devious villains, discover ancient secrets, or unravel other mysteries. Your analytical mind quickly formulates solutions to complicated problems and your honed senses identify even the most obscure clues. Wielding knowledge as a weapon, you study the creatures and dangers you encounter to exploit their weaknesses.
locales.name: Investigator

locales.description: Voc√™ busca descobrir a verdade, perseguindo obstinadamente pistas para revelar as tramas de vil√µes desonestos, descobrir segredos antigos ou desvendar outros mist√©rios. Sua mente anal√≠tica formula rapidamente solu√ß√µes para problemas complicados e seus sentidos agu√ßados identificam at√© mesmo as pistas mais obscuras. Empunhando o conhecimento como uma arma, voc√™ estuda as criaturas e os perigos que encontra para explorar seus pontos fracos.
locales.name: Investigador

locales.description: Many warriors rely on brute force, weighty armor, or cumbersome weapons. For you, battle is a dance where you move among foes with style and grace. You dart among combatants with flair and land powerful finishing moves with a flick of the wrist and a flash of the blade, all while countering attacks with elegant ripostes that keep enemies off balance. Harassing and thwarting your foes lets you charm fate and cheat death time and again with aplomb and plenty of flair.
locales.name: Swashbuckler

locales.description: Muitos guerreiros dependem da for√ßa bruta, de armaduras pesadas ou de armas inc√¥modas. Para voc√™, a batalha √© uma dan√ßa em que voc√™ se move entre os inimigos com estilo e gra√ßa. Voc√™ se lan√ßa entre os combatentes com eleg√¢ncia e executa golpes finais poderosos com um movimento do pulso e um lampejo da l√¢mina, ao mesmo tempo em que rebate os ataques com jogadas elegantes que mant√™m os inimigos desequilibrados. Ao perseguir e frustrar seus advers√°rios, voc√™ pode encantar o destino e enganar a morte v√°rias vezes com desenvoltura e muito talento.
locales.name: Pirata

locales.description: Combining the physicality and technique of a warrior with the ability to cast arcane magic, you seek to perfect the art of fusing spell and strike. While the hefty tome you carry reflects hours conducting arcane research, your enemies need no reminder of your training. They recognize it as you take them down.
locales.name: Magus

locales.description: Combinando a fisicalidade e a t√©cnica de um guerreiro com a capacidade de lan√ßar magia arcana, voc√™ busca aperfei√ßoar a arte de fundir feiti√ßo e ataque. Embora o pesado tomo que voc√™ carrega reflita horas de pesquisa arcana, seus inimigos n√£o precisam se lembrar de seu treinamento. Eles o reconhecem quando voc√™ os derruba.
locales.name: Magus

locales.description: The world is full of the unexplainable: ancient magic, dead gods, and even stranger things. In response, you've scavenged the best parts of every magical tradition and built up a collection of esoterica‚Äîa broken holy relic here, a sprig of mistletoe there‚Äîthat you can use to best any creature by exploiting their weaknesses and vulnerabilities. The mystic implement you carry is both badge and weapon, its symbolic weight helping you bargain with and subdue the supernatural. Every path to power has its restrictions and costs, but you turn them all to your advantage. You're a thaumaturge, and you work wonders.
locales.name: Thaumaturge

locales.description: O mundo est√° cheio do inexplic√°vel: magia antiga, deuses mortos e coisas ainda mais estranhas. Em resposta a isso, voc√™ pegou as melhores partes de todas as tradi√ß√µes m√°gicas e construiu uma cole√ß√£o de esot√©ricos - uma rel√≠quia sagrada quebrada aqui, um ramo de visco ali - que voc√™ pode usar para superar qualquer criatura explorando suas fraquezas e vulnerabilidades. O implemento m√≠stico que voc√™ carrega √© tanto uma ins√≠gnia quanto uma arma, pois seu peso simb√≥lico o ajuda a negociar e subjugar o sobrenatural. Cada caminho para o poder tem suas restri√ß√µes e custos, mas voc√™ os utiliza em seu benef√≠cio. Voc√™ √© um taumaturgo e faz maravilhas.
locales.name: Taumaturgo

locales.description: Dwarves are a short, stocky people who are often stubborn, fierce, and devoted.
locales.name: Dwarf

locales.description: An√µes possuem uma reputa√ß√£o merecida como um povo estoico e austero, arraigado em cidadelas e cidades esculpidas de rocha s√≥lida. Embora alguns os vejam como carrancudos artes√£os de pedra e metal, apenas os an√µes e aqueles que os conhecem de perto compreendem o seu zelo irrefre√°vel pelo trabalho e a sua dedica√ß√£o √† qualidade em vez de quantidade. Para um estranho eles podem parecer desconfiados e reclusos em seus cl√£s, mas os an√µes s√£o calorosos e atenciosos com seus amigos e fam√≠lia ‚Äî preenchendo seus sal√µes com o som de risadas e martelos batendo em bigornas.
locales.name: An√£o

locales.description: Elves are a tall, long-lived people with a strong tradition of art and magic.
locales.name: Elf

locales.description: Como um povo antigo, elfos presenciaram enormes mudan√ßas e possuem uma perspectiva √∫nica, que s√≥ √© poss√≠vel ao testemunhar o arco da hist√≥ria. Ap√≥s deixarem o mundo em tempos antigos, eles retornaram a uma terra quase irreconhec√≠vel e ainda lutam para reivindicar seus lares ancestrais ‚Äî especialmente aquelas invadidas por dem√¥nios terr√≠veis. Para alguns, os elfos s√£o alvo de admira√ß√£o ‚Äî graciosos e belos, com imenso talento e conhecimento. Contudo, os pr√≥prios elfos d√£o muito mais import√¢ncia √† sua liberdade pessoal do que a viver segundo estes ideais.
locales.name: Elfo

locales.description: Gnomes are short and hardy folk, with an unquenchable curiosity and eccentric habits.
locales.name: Gnome

locales.description: Muito tempo atr√°s, os primeiros ancestrais gnomos emigraram do Primeiro Mundo, o reino das fadas. Embora n√£o seja claro o motivo da peregrina√ß√£o inicial dos gnomos para Golarion, esta linhagem f√©erica se manifesta nos gnomos modernos como um racioc√≠nio bizarro, excentricidade, tend√™ncias obsessivas e algo geralmente visto como ingenuidade. As suas origens de outro mundo se refletem mais ainda em suas caracter√≠sticas f√≠sicas, como membros esguios, cabelos de cores brilhantes e tra√ßos faciais infantis e extremamente expressivos.
locales.name: Gnomo

locales.description: Goblins are a short, scrappy, energetic people who have spent millennia maligned and feared.
locales.name: Goblin

locales.description: As hist√≥rias convolutas √†s quais outras pessoas se prendem n√£o interessam aos goblins. Este povo pequeno vive no momento, e prefere hist√≥rias exageradas a registros concretos. Guerras que ocorreram algumas d√©cadas atr√°s s√£o praticamente hist√≥ria antiga. Incompreendidos pelos outros povos, os goblins s√£o felizes √† sua pr√≥pria maneira. As virtudes dos goblins incluem ser presentes, criativos e honestos. Eles se esfor√ßam em levar vidas cheias de satisfa√ß√£o em vez de preocuparem-se com o final de suas jornadas. Contar hist√≥rias, sem serem pedantes a respeito dos detalhes dos fatos. Eles podem ser baixos, mas sonham alto.
locales.name: Goblin

locales.description: Halflings are a short, resilient people who exhibit remarkable curiosity and humor.
locales.name: Halfling

locales.description: Sem um lugar para chamar de seu, halflings controlam poucos assentamentos maiores do que aldeias. Em vez disso, eles frequentemente vivem entre humanos dentro das muralhas de cidades maiores, montando pequenas comunidades junto dos povos mais altos. Muitos halflings levam vidas perfeitamente satisfat√≥rias √†s sombras de seus vizinhos maiores, enquanto outros preferem uma exist√™ncia n√¥made ‚Äî viajando o mundo e se aproveitando de quaisquer oportunidades e aventuras que surjam
locales.name: Halfling

locales.description: Humans are diverse and adaptable people with wide potential and deep ambitions.
locales.name: Human

locales.description: T√£o imprevis√≠veis e variados como os outros povos de Golarion, humanos possuem uma motiva√ß√£o excepcional e uma grande capacidade de tolerar e expandir. Embora muitas civiliza√ß√µes tenham prosperado antes da ascens√£o da humanidade, os humanos constru√≠ram algumas das maiores e mais terr√≠veis sociedades em todo o curso da hist√≥ria, tornando-se o povo mais populoso nos reinos ao redor do Mar Interior
locales.name: Humano

locales.description: Leshies are immortal nature spirits placed in small plant bodies, seeking to experience the world.
locales.name: Leshy

locales.description: Leshies s√£o esp√≠ritos imortais da natureza colocados em pequenos corpos de plantas, buscando experimentar o mundo.
locales.name: Leshy

locales.description: Orcs are proud, strong people with hardened physiques who value physical might and glory in combat.
locales.name: Orc

locales.description: Os orcs s√£o pessoas orgulhosas e fortes, com um f√≠sico robusto que valoriza o poder f√≠sico e a gl√≥ria em combate.
locales.name: Orc

locales.description: Azarketis, inheritors of a shattered empire's legacy, hold their proud traditions close but still surface to interact with the rest of the world.
locales.name: Azarketi

locales.description: Os Azarketis, herdeiros do legado de um imp√©rio destru√≠do, mant√™m suas orgulhosas tradi√ß√µes, mas ainda assim v√™m √† tona para interagir com o resto do mundo.
locales.name: Azarketi

locales.description: Curious and gregarious wanderers, catfolk combine features of felines and humanoids in both appearance and temperament. They enjoy learning new things, collecting new tales and trinkets, and ensuring their loved ones are safe and happy. Catfolk view themselves as chosen guardians of natural places in the world and are often recklessly brave, even in the face of overwhelming opposition.
locales.name: Catfolk

locales.description: Andarilhos curiosos e greg√°rios, os catfolk combinam caracter√≠sticas de felinos e human√≥ides tanto na apar√™ncia quanto no temperamento. Eles gostam de aprender coisas novas, colecionar novos contos e bugigangas e garantir que seus entes queridos estejam seguros e felizes. Os catfolk se consideram guardi√µes escolhidos de lugares naturais do mundo e, muitas vezes, s√£o imprudentemente corajosos, mesmo diante de uma oposi√ß√£o esmagadora.
locales.name: Catfolk

locales.description: Once human and now something apart, fetchlings display the Shadow Plane's ancient influence through monochrome complexions, glowing eyes, and the casting of supernatural shadows.
locales.name: Fetchling

locales.description: Outrora humanos e agora algo √† parte, os fetchlings demonstram a antiga influ√™ncia do Plano das Sombras por meio de tez monocrom√°tica, olhos brilhantes e o lan√ßamento de sombras sobrenaturais.
locales.name: Fetchling

locales.description: Powerfully-built humanoids that resemble hyenas, gnolls are cunning warriors and hunters. Their frightening visage and efficient tactics have given them an ill-starred reputation.
locales.name: Gnoll

locales.description: Human√≥ides de constitui√ß√£o poderosa que se assemelham a hienas, os gnolls s√£o guerreiros e ca√ßadores astutos. Sua apar√™ncia assustadora e suas t√°ticas eficientes lhes deram uma reputa√ß√£o de mau-car√°ter.
locales.name: Gnoll

locales.description: Gripplis are a shy and cautious people who generally seek to avoid being drawn into the complicated and dangerous affairs of others. Despite their outlook and small stature, gripplis often take bold and noble action when the situation demands it.
locales.name: Grippli

locales.description: Os gripplis s√£o pessoas t√≠midas e cautelosas que geralmente procuram evitar se envolver em assuntos complicados e perigosos de outras pessoas. Apesar de sua perspectiva e pequena estatura, os gripplis costumam tomar atitudes ousadas e nobres quando a situa√ß√£o exige.
locales.name: Grippli

locales.description: Taller and stronger than their goblin kin, hobgoblins are equals in strength and size to humans, with broad shoulders and long, powerful arms.
locales.name: Hobgoblin

locales.description: Mais altos e mais fortes do que seus parentes goblins, os hobgoblins s√£o iguais em for√ßa e tamanho aos humanos, com ombros largos e bra√ßos longos e poderosos.
locales.name: Hobgoblin

locales.description: Kitsune are a charismatic and witty people with a connection to the spiritual that grants them many magical abilities, chiefly the power to shapechange into other forms. Whether they pass unseen among other peoples or hold their tails high, kitsune are clever observers of the societies around them.
locales.name: Kitsune

locales.description: Os Kitsune s√£o um povo carism√°tico e espirituoso com uma conex√£o com o espiritual que lhes concede muitas habilidades m√°gicas, principalmente o poder de se transformar em outras formas. Quer passem despercebidos entre os outros povos ou mantenham a cauda erguida, os kitsune s√£o observadores inteligentes das sociedades ao seu redor.
locales.name: Kitsune

locales.description: Every kobold knows that their slight frame belies true, mighty draconic power. They are ingenious crafters and devoted allies within their warrens, but those who trespass into their territory find them to be inspired skirmishers, especially when they have the backing of a draconic sorcerer or true dragon overlord. However, these reptilian opportunists prove happy to cooperate with other humanoids when it‚Äôs to their benefit, combining caution and cunning to make their fortunes in the wider world.
locales.name: Kobold

locales.description: Todos os kobolds sabem que sua estrutura leve esconde o verdadeiro e poderoso poder drac√¥nico. Eles s√£o engenhosos artes√£os e aliados devotados em seus redutos, mas aqueles que invadem seu territ√≥rio os consideram inspirados lutadores, especialmente quando contam com o apoio de um feiticeiro drac√¥nico ou de um verdadeiro senhor dos drag√µes. No entanto, esses oportunistas reptilianos se mostram felizes em cooperar com outros humanoides quando isso √© ben√©fico para eles, combinando cautela e ast√∫cia para fazer fortuna no mundo mais amplo.
locales.name: Kobold

locales.description: Lizardfolk are consummate survivors, heirs to empires considered ancient even by the elves.
locales.name: Lizardfolk

locales.description: Os Lizardfolk s√£o sobreviventes consumados, herdeiros de imp√©rios considerados antigos at√© mesmo pelos elfos.
locales.name: Lizardfolk

locales.description: With humanoid figures and serpentine heads, nagaji are heralds, companions, and servitors of powerful nagas. They hold a deep reverence for holy areas and spiritual truths, an aspect many others find as intimidating as a nagaji's appearance.
locales.name: Nagaji

locales.description: Com figuras humanoides e cabe√ßas serpentinas, os nagaji s√£o arautos, companheiros e servos de nagas poderosos. Eles t√™m uma profunda rever√™ncia por √°reas sagradas e verdades espirituais, um aspecto que muitos outros consideram t√£o intimidador quanto a apar√™ncia de um nagaji.
locales.name: Nagaji

locales.description: Ysoki‚Äîas ratfolk call themselves‚Äîare a clever, adaptable, and fastidious ancestry who happily crowd their large families into the smallest of living spaces.
locales.name: Ratfolk

locales.description: Os ysoki - como os ratfolk se autodenominam - s√£o uma linhagem inteligente, adapt√°vel e meticulosa que aglomera alegremente suas fam√≠lias numerosas nos menores espa√ßos habit√°veis.
locales.name: Ratfolk

locales.description: Tengus are a gregarious and resourceful people that have spread far and wide from their ancestral home in Tian Xia, collecting and combining whatever innovations and traditions they happen across with those from their own long history.
locales.name: Tengu

locales.description: Os tengus s√£o um povo greg√°rio e engenhoso que se espalhou por toda parte a partir de seu lar ancestral em Tian Xia, coletando e combinando quaisquer inova√ß√µes e tradi√ß√µes que encontrem com as de sua pr√≥pria longa hist√≥ria.
locales.name: Tengu

locales.description: Vanaras are inquisitive and mischievous monkey-like humanoids with short, soft fur, expressive eyes, and long, prehensile tails. Their handlike feet and agile builds serve them well in the jungle realms where most vanaras live.
locales.name: Vanara

locales.description: Os vanaras s√£o humanoides curiosos e travessos, semelhantes a macacos, com pelo curto e macio, olhos expressivos e caudas longas e pre√™nseis. Seus p√©s semelhantes a m√£os e sua constitui√ß√£o √°gil s√£o muito √∫teis nos reinos da selva onde a maioria dos vanaras vive.
locales.name: Vanara

locales.description: Androids tend to be logical introverts, rational and contemplative. Insatiably curious, with an urge to understand themselves and the world around them, androids place great value on intellectual pursuits. They have difficulty interpreting and expressing emotions, both in themselves and in others, which makes them seem distant and uncaring. While androids can forge emotional bonds, they find it more difficult to connect with non-androids.
locales.name: Android

locales.description: Os androides tendem a ser introvertidos l√≥gicos, racionais e contemplativos. Insaciavelmente curiosos, com um desejo de entender a si mesmos e o mundo ao seu redor, os androides valorizam muito as atividades intelectuais. Eles t√™m dificuldade para interpretar e expressar emo√ß√µes, tanto em si mesmos quanto nos outros, o que os faz parecer distantes e indiferentes. Embora os androides possam criar la√ßos emocionais, eles t√™m mais dificuldade de se conectar com os n√£o androides.
locales.name: Androide

locales.description: Simultaneously more and less than mortal, tieflings are the offspring of humans and fiends. With otherworldly blood and traits to match, tieflings are often shunned and despised out of reactionary fear. Most tieflings never know their fiendish sire, as the coupling that produced their curse occurred generations earlier.
locales.name: Tiefling

locales.description: Simultaneamente mais e menos que mortais, os tieflings s√£o descendentes de humanos e dem√¥nios. Com sangue e caracter√≠sticas de outro mundo, os tieflings s√£o frequentemente evitados e desprezados por medo reacion√°rio. A maioria dos tieflings nunca conhece seu pai demon√≠aco, pois o acoplamento que produziu sua maldi√ß√£o ocorreu gera√ß√µes antes.
locales.name: Tiefling

Ceaseless watcher, turn your gaze upon this wretched thing.

stats.skywatch.blue

Not associated with SkySentry.

locales.description: Applied to accounts which claim to be or are verified to be US Government agencies.
locales.name: United States Government Account

locales.description: Applied to posts that use stereotypes, discriminatory generalizations, or identity-based attacks that don't fit other categories (slurs, dehumanizing rhetoric, etc.)
locales.name: Discriminatory Language

locales.description: This label will appear on accounts that are affiliated with the labeler Skywatch Blue. If this label is not present, the account is not affiliated with Skywatch Blue, regardless of handle, profile, or name similarity.
locales.name: Skywatch Blue Affiliated Account

locales.description: Applied to accounts which claim to be an anonymous account representing government workers‚Äîe.g., altnps, altfda
locales.name: Alt Gov Account

locales.description: User frequently posts links to sources which are used to launder fringe or extremist ideas into mainstream discourse. For more information on why this is harmful, regardless of intent, please see: Phillips, Whitney. 'The Oxygen of Amplification.' Data and Society, May 22, 2018. https://datasociety.net/library/oxygen-of-amplification/.
locales.name: Amplifier

locales.description: Account's replies frequently lack substantive content, including: emoji-only replies, meme-or-image-only replies, cut and paste text that is frequently repeated in multiple threads, "cry more"/insults/slurs, and other forms of low-effort reply spam that are intended to troll or enrage rather than engage in conversation. Appeals will be accepted for active accounts that have ceased to engage in this sort of activity for at least a month.
locales.name: Low Quality Replies

locales.description: Applied to accounts and / or posts which engage in rhetoric which has the effect of dehumanizing a group of people.
locales.name: Dehumanizing Rhetoric

locales.description: Applied to accounts which engage in indiscriminate follow farming and follow-back networks and applied to posts using hashtags or linking to sites utilized for follow-farming.
locales.name: Follow Farming

locales.description:
Applied to accounts which don't 'smell right'‚Äîincludes accounts with zero posts and thousands of followers with similar bios, accounts that only reply but don't clearly fit into the troll or reply guy mold, or clusters of accounts which appear designed to boost the content of another account.

Please note that accounts will only be added here after clear indication of inauthentic behavior. We will not and do not label accounts solely for linking to Only Fans. Sex work is real work.
locales.name: Suspected Inauthentic Behavior

locales.description: Applied to posts which contain well-known English-language slurs disparaging people based on race, ethnicity, religion, nationality, sexual orientation, or gender.
locales.name: Slur

locales.description: Automatically applied to key terms which are indicative of ongoing discourse. Posts engaged in meta-discourse will likely be labeled as well. Labels will expire after seven (7) days.
locales.name: Discourse Bait

locales.description: Label for posts and accounts which spam users with off-topic replies, engage in troll like behavior, or which engage in concern trolling. This label is also applied to accounts whose bio contains several terms that are frequently used by troll accounts and may accidentally catch some reclaiming uses: please appeal any errors by tapping the label.
locales.name: Troll

locales.description: Applied to posts which contain a link to sites known to be sources of disinformation and misinformation. These sites often serve to launder fringe ideas, conspiracy theories, and extreme political positions into the mainstream. Accounts which frequently or primarily post links to these sources will be labeled as Amplifiers.
locales.name: Fringe Media & Disinfo

locales.description: You know what this is for.
locales.name: Alf

locales.description: Applied to posts which contain a link to sites which are considered alt-tech, such as givesendgo.com or rumble.com. Read more about alt-tech here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alt-tech
locales.name: Alt-tech

locales.description: This is a label for people who want a badge that says "Beans" on their profile.
locales.name: Beans

locales.description:
This user has been here since before the media tab (August 2023). This label is not a label of honor‚Äîno highly esteemed deed is commemorated here.

This label is meant in jest and dates to early experiments in labeling. It is applied to the first 800,000 Bluesky accounts. Appeals honored.
locales.name: Bluesky Elder

locales.description: Applied to posts which contain a link to sites commonly used for sports betting, such as Draft Kings or Fan Duel. If you or a loved one have a gambling problem, please find help here: https://www.ncpgambling.org/help-treatment/help-by-state/
locales.name: Sports Betting Link

locales.description: Applied to accounts who self describe as being a ‚ÄúTrans-Exclusionary Radical Feminist‚Äù (TERF), ‚ÄúGender Critical‚Äù (GC), "Gender Realist", use known signage such as "üíúü§çüíö" or "Feministü¶ñ", as well as high-profile individuals whose body of work identifies them as such, or accounts with multiple posts which attack trans people or use pejorative terms such as TRA.
locales.name: TERF

locales.description: Claims which the posting account asserts or implies to be factual without supporting evidence or credible sourcing details. Also applied to accounts which regularly these post this type of claim.
locales.name: Unsourced Claims

creator.description: WAFFLES OR PANCAKES? LIKE THE LABELER TO FIND OUT

An anti-zoophilia labeller, from the team behind the Zoophile Mute List.
